description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Lamb Steaks With Roasted Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb dishes,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Lamb,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marinated Lamb Steaks With Roasted Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oil, juice, rind, syrup, Dijonnaise, garlic and celery salt in a bowl. Season with pepper. Add steaks and toss to coat. Cover and marinate for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cook vegetables following pack instructions. When cooked, remove from the oven, cover with foil to keep warm and set aside.
Preheat barbecue grill on medium. Once hot, add lamb steaks and cook for 3 minutes each side for medium rare or until cooked to your liking.
Pour marinade into a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes. Serve steaks with sauce, vegetables and green beans.
